languages.text: "Офицеры без конца обсуждают твою личную жизнь, {name}... Нашу личную жизнь. Якобы у тебя множество избранников, чему я, конечно, не верю. Опровергни эти слухи открыто, и у меня будет основание заткнуть сплетников".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Некоторые личности считают, что имеют право претендовать на твое сердце, {name}. Я дал понять свою позицию, но получил... неприятный контраргумент". {n}На скулах проктора играют желваки.{/n} "Я не стану делить тебя, {name} — ни с кем, никогда. Ответь мне, ты все еще мо{mf|й|я}?"
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.text: "The officers never stop discussing your personal life, {name}... Our personal life. They claim you have multiple suitors, which of course I don't believe. Refute these rumours openly, and I'll have cause to shut down those gossips."
languages.original_text: "Офицеры без конца обсуждают твою личную жизнь, {name}... Нашу личную жизнь. Якобы у тебя множество избранников, чему я, конечно, не верю. Опровергни эти слухи открыто, и у меня будет основание заткнуть сплетников".

traits.locale_text: "The officers never stop discussing your personal life, {name}... Our personal life. They claim you have multiple suitors, which of course I don't believe. Refute these rumours openly, and I'll have cause to shut down those gossips."

"The officers never stop discussing your personal life, {name}... Our personal life. They claim you have multiple suitors, which of course I don't believe. Refute these rumours openly, and I'll have cause to shut down those gossips."

"The officers never stop discussing your personal life, {name}... Our personal life. They claim you have multiple suitors, which of course I don't believe. Refute these rumours openly, and I'll have cause to shut down those gossips."

"The officers never stop discussing your personal life, {name}... Our personal life. They claim you have multiple suitors, which of course I don't believe. Refute these rumours openly, and I'll have cause to shut down those gossips."

"The officers never stop discussing your personal life, {name}... Our personal life. They claim you have multiple suitors, which of course I don't believe. Refute these rumours openly, and I'll have cause to shut down those gossips."

languages.text: "Die Offiziere hören nie auf, über Euer Privatleben zu tuscheln, {name} ... Unser Privatleben. Sie behaupten, Ihr hättet mehrere Liebhaber, was ich natürlich nicht glaube. Dementiert diese Gerüchte öffentlich, dann habe ich einen Grund, ihnen einen Riegel vorzuschieben."
languages.original_text: "The officers never stop discussing your personal life, {name}... Our personal life. They claim you have multiple suitors, which of course I don't believe. Refute these rumours openly, and I'll have cause to shut down those gossips."

traits.locale_text: "Die Offiziere hören nie auf, über Euer Privatleben zu tuscheln, {name} ... Unser Privatleben. Sie behaupten, Ihr hättet mehrere Liebhaber, was ich natürlich nicht glaube. Dementiert diese Gerüchte öffentlich, dann habe ich einen Grund, ihnen einen Riegel vorzuschieben."

languages.text: « Les officiers passent leur temps à discuter de votre vie privée, {name}... de notre vie privée. Ils prétendent que vous avez plusieurs partenaires, une allégation à laquelle je n'accorde évidemment aucun crédit. Si vous voulez bien réfuter ces commérages ouvertement, je me chargerai ensuite de les faire taire. »
languages.original_text: "The officers never stop discussing your personal life, {name}... Our personal life. They claim you have multiple suitors, which of course I don't believe. Refute these rumours openly, and I'll have cause to shut down those gossips."

traits.locale_text: « Les officiers passent leur temps à discuter de votre vie privée, {name}... de notre vie privée. Ils prétendent que vous avez plusieurs partenaires, une allégation à laquelle je n'accorde évidemment aucun crédit. Si vous voulez bien réfuter ces commérages ouvertement, je me chargerai ensuite de les faire taire. »

languages.text: 「{name}、士官たちがあなたの私生活の話をやめないのです…いえ、私たちの私生活のことですが。あなたには複数の求婚者がいると彼らは言っていますが、もちろんそんなことは信じていません。その噂を公に否定してくだされば、私もあの連中のゴシップを封じる理由ができます」
languages.original_text: "The officers never stop discussing your personal life, {name}... Our personal life. They claim you have multiple suitors, which of course I don't believe. Refute these rumours openly, and I'll have cause to shut down those gossips."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、士官たちがあなたの私生活の話をやめないのです…いえ、私たちの私生活のことですが。あなたには複数の求婚者がいると彼らは言っていますが、もちろんそんなことは信じていません。その噂を公に否定してくだされば、私もあの連中のゴシップを封じる理由ができます」

languages.text: «Los oficiales nunca dejan de hablar de su vida personal, {name}... De nuestra vida personal. Afirman que tiene múltiples pretendientes, lo que claramente es un rumor infundado. Si lo refuta públicamente, tendré motivos para poner fin al chismorreo».
languages.original_text: "The officers never stop discussing your personal life, {name}... Our personal life. They claim you have multiple suitors, which of course I don't believe. Refute these rumours openly, and I'll have cause to shut down those gossips."

traits.locale_text: «Los oficiales nunca dejan de hablar de su vida personal, {name}... De nuestra vida personal. Afirman que tiene múltiples pretendientes, lo que claramente es un rumor infundado. Si lo refuta públicamente, tendré motivos para poner fin al chismorreo».

languages.text: “那些军官一直在讨论你的私人关系，{name}……我是说，我们的私人关系。他们说你有很多位伴侣，不过，我当然不会相信这些谎言。公开驳斥这些谣言吧，这样我就有理由制止那些流言蜚语了。”
languages.original_text: "The officers never stop discussing your personal life, {name}... Our personal life. They claim you have multiple suitors, which of course I don't believe. Refute these rumours openly, and I'll have cause to shut down those gossips."

traits.locale_text: “那些军官一直在讨论你的私人关系，{name}……我是说，我们的私人关系。他们说你有很多位伴侣，不过，我当然不会相信这些谎言。公开驳斥这些谣言吧，这样我就有理由制止那些流言蜚语了。”

languages.text: "Subaylar, özel hayatını... Özel hayatımızı konuşmadan edemiyor {name}. Birden çok talibin olduğunu iddia ediyorlar. Ben buna inanmıyorum. Bu söylentileri açıkça yalanla, ben de bir daha konuşmamalarını sağlayayım."
languages.original_text: "The officers never stop discussing your personal life, {name}... Our personal life. They claim you have multiple suitors, which of course I don't believe. Refute these rumours openly, and I'll have cause to shut down those gossips."
